refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the log file to write log messages to

refsect1.title: Description

listitem.simpara: A reference to the XSLT parser.
This parameter is either a boolean value which toggles logging on and off, or a string containing the logfile in which log errors too.

refsect1.para: This function allows you to set the file in which you want XSLT log messages to, XSLT log messages are different than error messages, in that log messages are not actually error messages but rather messages related to the state of the XSLT processor. They are useful for debugging XSLT, when something goes wrong.

note.simpara: Please note that file:// is needed in front of path if you use Windows.
